entry.tran: 信奉同一宗教的人;同一教派的人
entry.def: A person's co-religionists are people who have the same religion.

example.ex: Not surprisingly, they supported their co-religionists.
example.tran: 他们支持他们的教友，这不足为奇。

means.word_mean: 1. someone having the same religion as another person
